roleset.name: in short supply
roleset.note: SCARCE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from scarce.01-j)

role.descr: entity that doesn't have very much
what there isn't very much of

example.name: arg1
example.text: Since the bears are scarce , bear bile is precious .

example.name: both args
example.text: Yet the international bee convention was scarce of bees.
